data.text:
✈️
A Montenegrin city worth visiting!

Located in the Bay of Kotor, the beautiful coastal town of Tivat awaits you for a unique vacation experience. 

#TurkishAirlines
takeoff

✈️🇹🇷
We proudly celebrated the 100th anniversary of the greatest victory with a historic mission attended by @igairport and all our affiliates. We commemorated Ghazi Mustafa Kemal Atatürk and our heroic martyrs with great respect and gratitude.

Happy August 30th Victory Day! https://t.co/5f8s2LbFLy

✈️🇹🇷
Stay tuned until tomorrow for the celebration of the century! @igairport 

#TurkishAirlines #IstanbulAirport https://t.co/YZCKmOgiLY

data.text:
✈️🎊
According to the World Air Transport Statistics data, published on yearly basis by the IATA; Turkish Cargo, the rising logistics brand of Turkish Airlines, ranked 1st among the European air cargo carriers!

We congratulate the entire #TurkishCargo family.

#TurkishAirlines https://t.co/pdHpLUn0Qq

✈️
We are starting out on a new journey where we will share the excitement of millions of people. 

Coming soon...

#TurkishAirlines https://t.co/5An5hZ39Or

✈️ 🌊
Summer is the best time to embrace the oceans and seas! Plan your next journey to dream in colors borrowed from the waves.

#TurkishAirlines https://t.co/dswbvh895T

✈️
Happy 50th anniversary of our Geneva flights!

As the airline that flies to the most countries in the world, we continue to shorten the distances and bring you together with your loved ones.
 
#TurkishAirlines

✈️📸
Iconic destinations promising unforgettable photographs await you.

Happy World Photography Day!

#TurkishAirlines

✈️ 👩🏻‍✈️👨🏻‍✈️
In order to best answer the question on everyone's mind "How to become a pilot?", we've conferred with an expert and had a pleasant interview with Captain Pilot Oğuz Yeten.

Visit our blog to find out the tips and tricks 👇

#TurkishAirlines

✈️
Experience comfort in the sky like never before on your Business Class flights.

Enjoy a pleasant journey with superior service quality and privileges at the highest standards. 

#TurkishAirlines

✈️☀️
They say Bodrum is “the land of eternal blue.”

Plan your journey to the Mediterranean’s most glamorous spot of the Turkish Riviera now.

#TurkishAirlines

✈️
We're bringing you together with the summer's most popular experience points.

Discover brand new routes and shorten the distances between you and your loved ones with our updated August flight plan. 

#TurkishAirlines

✈️
Carry out your transactions at aircraft speed via our mobile app!

Book your ticket and plan your trip swiftly using our application to enjoy a pleasant and comfortable flight experience.

Download now 👇

#TurkishAirlines

✈️♻️
Make use of our Co2mission platform to render your travels more environmentally friendly!
Contribute to a sustainable future by offsetting the emissions from your flights.

Watch the video to learn how to use our platform 👇

#TurkishAirlines #Sustainability #Co2mission

✈️
Thanks to the Sunflower Lanyard, we notice the hidden disabilities and gladly provide service special to your needs for a pleasant experience during your journey.

Don't forget to get your lanyard from the Istanbul Airport Assisted Check-in Counter.

#TurkishAirlines https://t.co/g5iDZjYCVb

✈️
Happy 50th anniversary of our first Hamburg flight!
 
As the airline that flies to the most countries in the world, we continue to shorten the distances and bring you together with your loved ones.
 
#TurkishAirlines

✈️
Your spendings turn into Miles with Booking! 

You can earn 5 Miles for every 1 EUR you spend on your accommodations made with Booking until 31 October 2022!

#TurkishAirlines

✈️
We carry out our operations transporting our guests to the most countries in the world with environmental and social awareness, and take responsibility for a sustainable future.
 
#Sustainability #TurkishAirlines https://t.co/rvur6HDAe0

✈️♻️
We offset the carbon emissions from our employees' flights for a sustainable future and now invite our passengers to take responsibility with our new Co2mission platform.
 
For more information 👇
 
#TurkishAirlines #Sustainability #Co2mission

domain.name: Sports Team

data.text:
✈️⚽
Don’t miss Germany take on England this weekend at Wembley! 

Watch the UEFA Women's EURO Final live on Sport 24 this Sunday, July 31 on selected Turkish Airlines flights. Go to Live TV to experience the joy of football. 
 
#TurkishAirlines https://t.co/nr1sZY6ms0

✈️
Explore all corners of the world with loved ones. 

Invite a friend with the You&Friends feature on this #InternationalDayOfFriendship and earn 500 Miles as they enjoy their first flight as a Miles&Smiles member. 
Have a pleasant journey. 

#TurkishAirlines

data.text:

Enjoy planning your trips more comfortably with our mobile app's newest features! You can now purchase extra baggage allowance for your flight and order personal meals.

Click now to update or download our mobile app. 👇

#TurkishAirlines

✈️♻️
Contribute to combat climate change and carbon emission reduction projects with the guidance on our Co2mission platform.

Co2mission for a sustainable future will be live on 1 August!

#TurkishAirlines #Sustainability #Co2mission https://t.co/C8djSKZOK2

✈️
Voting has begun for the @skytrax_uk 2022 World Airline Awards.

Don't forget to participate in this survey, which selects the best of the aviation industry in many categories every year, and vote for the best airline until August 19th.

#TurkishAirlines

data.text:
✈️
Our dreams, exceeded the skies, and had no limit for 89 years.

Today, as the airline that flies to the most countries in the world, we continue to connect you to 336 destinations, together with our big family.
Have a pleasant flight...
